title: 3dOverlap
description: Counts the number of voxels that are nonzero in all input datasets

output_brik.title: Output BRIK file
output_brik.description: BRIK file with count of overlaps at each voxel (if -save is used)

output_head.title: Output HEAD file
output_head.description: HEAD file with count of overlaps at each voxel (if -save is used)
